query-define.name: query1
query-define.where: est.sendtime>=to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.sendtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.OPERATEROLEID in (@subroleFromDeptid@) and est.OPERATEROLEID is not null and est.mainNetSortOne in (@mainNetSortOne@) and est.TODEPTID in (@areaid@) and est.operatetype=91 and LENGTH(est.operateroleid)=32

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.mainid,est.sheetid,est.title,est.mainnetsortone,est.todeptid,est.senduserid,est.mainreportlimit from est_urgentfault est where est.sendtime>=to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.sendtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.OPERATEROLEID ='@s1@' and est.mainNetSortOne='@s2@' and est.TODEPTID='@s3@' and est.operatetype=91 and LENGTH(est.operateroleid)=32

query-define.name: query2
query-define.where: est.sendtime>=to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.sendtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.operatetype=91 and est.mainreportlimit<est.operatetime and est.OPERATEROLEID in (@subroleFromDeptid@) and est.OPERATEROLEID is not null and est.mainNetSortOne in (@mainNetSortOne@) and est.TODEPTID in (@areaid@) and LENGTH(est.operateroleid)=32

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.mainid,est.sheetid,est.title,est.mainnetsortone,est.todeptid,est.senduserid,est.mainreportlimit from est_urgentfault est where est.sendtime>=to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.sendtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.operatetype=91 and est.mainreportlimit<est.operatetime and est.OPERATEROLEID ='@s1@' and est.mainNetSortOne='@s2@' and est.TODEPTID='@s3@' and LENGTH(est.operateroleid)=32

select distinct est.mainid,est.sheetid,est.title,est.mainnetsortone,est.todeptid,est.senduserid,est.mainreportlimit from est_urgentfault est where est.sendtime>=to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.sendtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.mainid not in (select distinct est1.mainid from est_urgentfault est1 where est1.status=1 and (est1.mainifrecord is null or est1.mainifrecord=0) and est1.operatetype=91 and est1.mainreportlimit<est1.operatetime and LENGTH(est.operateroleid)=32) and est.OPERATEROLEID ='@s1@' and est.mainNetSortOne='@s2@' and est.TODEPTID='@s3@' and est.operatetype=91 and LENGTH(est.operateroleid)=32

query-define.name: query1
query-define.where: est.sendtime>=to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.sendtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.OPERATEUSERID in (@userByDeptid@) and est.OPERATEUSERID is not null and est.mainNetSortOne in (@mainNetSortOne@) and est.TODEPTID in (@areaid@) and est.operatetype=91

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.mainid,est.sheetid,est.title,est.mainnetsortone,est.todeptid,est.senduserid,est.mainreportlimit from est_urgentfault est where est.sendtime>=to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.sendtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.OPERATEUSERID ='@s1@' and est.mainNetSortOne='@s2@' and est.TODEPTID='@s3@' and est.operatetype=91

query-define.name: query2
query-define.where: est.sendtime>=to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.sendtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.operatetype=91 and est.mainreportlimit<est.operatetime and est.OPERATEUSERID in (@userByDeptid@) and est.OPERATEUSERID is not null and est.mainNetSortOne in (@mainNetSortOne@) and est.TODEPTID in (@areaid@)

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.mainid,est.sheetid,est.title,est.mainnetsortone,est.todeptid,est.senduserid,est.mainreportlimit from est_urgentfault est where est.sendtime>=to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.sendtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.operatetype=91 and est.mainreportlimit<est.operatetime and est.OPERATEUSERID ='@s1@' and est.mainNetSortOne='@s2@' and est.TODEPTID='@s3@'

select distinct est.mainid,est.sheetid,est.title,est.mainnetsortone,est.todeptid,est.senduserid,est.mainreportlimit from est_urgentfault est where est.sendtime>=to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.sendtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.mainid not in (select distinct est1.mainid from est_urgentfault est1 where est1.status=1 and (est1.mainifrecord is null or est1.mainifrecord=0) and est1.operatetype=91 and est1.mainreportlimit<est1.operatetime) and est.OPERATEUSERID ='@s1@' and est.mainNetSortOne='@s2@' and est.TODEPTID='@s3@' and est.operatetype=91
